description: A spire shell printed in black lying on its side; dark brown coloring added on top and below; "Balea Biplicata x 4" printed to R of shell opening.

medium: Oil and black ink, printed image on found image
portfolio: From Mein Schwan: Skizzen zu Einem Buch
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed and dated in pencil below image, LC: G Multerer │ 2001
title: Untitled (Brown shell, balea biplicata)
